src:
Praveen/Melati Lolos Ke Perempat Final Fuzhou China Open 2019
07 Nov 2019, 15:07 by Danang Sundoro



Praveen/Melati Lolos Ke Perempat Final Fuzhou China Open 2019



Praveen/Melati Lolos Ke Perempat Final Fuzhou China Open 2019


KBRN, Fuzhou : Ganda Campuran Indonesia mengamankan tiket perempat final Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019 di stadion Haixia Olympic Sports Center, Kamis (7/11/2019) Sore.Unggulan ketujuh ganda Indonesia, Praveen Jordan/Melati Daeva Oktavianti mengalahkan pasangan suami istri asal Inggris, Chris Adcock/Gabrielle Adcock, dengan skor 21-11, 21-13 dalam pertandingan berdurasi 30 menit. “Pasangan Eropa bisa dibilang pola mainnya rumit, mereka punya pola main yang nggak ngenakin buat kami. Tapi di pertandingan kali ini kami nggak mau memberi celah ke mereka masuk ke permainan mereka dan berusaha main di pola kami. Dari awal kami bisa langsung in dan tekan terus,” ujar Praveen usai laga dalam keterangan tertulis kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Kamis (7/11/2019) Sore.“Kalau dibilang lebih pede, memang mau awalnya main maksimal dulu, dan memang sekarang lebih percaya diri. Dulu kalau dibilang lawan mereka ramai, sekarang bisa jauh, itu proses. Dulu kalah straight game, kalau menang rubber game, lalu bisa menang rubber dan sekarang bisa menang straight game, semuanya itu proses,” tambah Praveen. Praveen/Melati akan berhadapan dengan Yuta Watanabe/Arisa Higashino di babak perempat final, Kamis (8/11/2019) besok. Skor pertemuan sementara 2-0 untuk keunggulan Praveen/Melati.“Kami kan sudah pernah ketemu mereka, jadi nanti kami pelajari lagi di pertemuan sebelumnya bagaimana strateginya. Mereka pemain yang ulet, jadi sebelum bola jatuh di lapangan, kami harus siap terus,” kata Melati soal laga perempat final. 
BACA JUGA : Marcus/Kevin Melaju 1/4 Final Fuzhou China Open 2019
BACA JUGA : Fuzhou China Open 2019 : Sedih, Gregoria Terhenti
Masih ada satu wakil ganda campuran Indonesia yang akan bertanding memperebutkan tiket perempat final yaitu Rinov Rivaldy/Pitha Haningtyas Mentari yang berjumpa Goh Soon Huat/Shevon Jemie Lai dari Malaysia pada babak kedua Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019. (Keterangan Foto : PP.PBSI)
text:
Praveen / Jasmine Passes to the 2019 Fuzhou China Open Quarterfinals
Nov 7 2019, 15:07 by Danang Sundoro



Praveen / Jasmine Passes to the 2019 Fuzhou China Open Quarterfinals



Praveen / Jasmine Passes to the 2019 Fuzhou China Open Quarterfinals


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesian Mixed Doubles secure tickets for the quarterfinals of the Fuzhou China Open 2019 Badminton Tournament at the Haixia Olympic Sports Center stadium, Thursday (11/07/2019) Afternoon. Indonesian double seventh month, Praveen Jordan / Melati Daeva Oktavianti defeated a couple from England, Chris Adcock / Gabrielle Adcock, with a score of 21-11, 21-13 in a 30-minute match. "European couples are arguably complicated playing patterns, they have play patterns that aren't sure for us. But in the game this time we don't want to give a gap to them getting into their game and trying to play in our patterns. From the start we can immediately go in and press and hold, "Praveen said after the match in a written statement to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Thursday (11/07/2019) Afternoon." If you say more confident, you really want to play first at first, and indeed more confident now. In the past, if they were told that their opponents were busy, now they could be far away, it was a process. Previously lost straight game, if you win rubber game, then you can win rubber and now you can win straight game, everything is a process, "Praveen added. Praveen / Melati will face Yuta Watanabe / Arisa Higashino in the quarter-finals on Thursday (11/08/2019) tomorrow. The interim meeting score was 2-0 in favor of Praveen / Melati. "We've met them before, so we will learn in the previous meeting what the strategy is. They are tenacious players, so before the ball falls on the field, we must be ready to continue, "said Melati about the quarterfinal match.
READ ALSO: Marcus / Kevin Drove 1/4 Final of the Fuzhou China Open 2019
READ ALSO: Fuzhou China Open 2019: Sad, Gregoria Stopped
There is still one Indonesian mixed doubles representative who will compete for the quarterfinal ticket Rinov Rivaldy / Pitha Haningtyas Mentari who met Goh Soon Huat / Shevon Jemie Lai from Malaysia in the second round of the Fuzhou China Open Badminton Tournament 2019. (Photo Caption: PP.PBSI)
